info.description: API for managing donations and campaigns in the Dona Tutti platform
info.title: Dona Tutti API

get.description: Check if the current user has a specific permission

post.description: Register a new user with the provided details

get.description: Get the current user's authentication context including role and permissions
Get a list of all campaigns

post.description: Create a new campaign with the provided details

get.description: Get all activities for a specific campaign

post.description: Create a new activity for a campaign

get.description: Get activity details by ID

put.description: Update activity details by ID. Only provided fields will be updated.

get.description: Get a list of all donations for a specific campaign
get.summary: Get all donations for a campaign

post.description: Create a new donation for a campaign

get.description: Get donation details by ID
Get a list of all receipts for a specific campaign
get.summary: Get all receipts for a campaign

post.description: Create a new receipt for a campaign

get.description: Get receipt details by ID

post.description: Upload a PDF document for a receipt

get.description: Get all payment methods configured for a specific campaign

post.description: Add a payment method to a campaign with optional details

put.description: Update a campaign payment method and its details

delete.description: Remove a payment method from a campaign

get.description: Get campaign details by ID

post.description: Upload an image for a campaign

get.description: Get a list of all campaign categories

post.description: Create a new campaign category with the provided details

get.description: Get category details by ID
Get a list of all donors

post.description: Create a new donor with the provided details

get.description: Get donor details by ID
Get a list of all organizers, optionally filtered by user_id

post.description: Create a new organizer with the provided details

get.description: Get organizer details by ID
Get a list of all available payment methods
Get a specific payment method by its ID
Get a list of all permissions in the system
Get a list of all active roles in the system
Get role details by role name
Get a list of all users

post.description: Create a new user with the provided details

get.description: Get current authenticated user's details including role information
Get user details by ID

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
